original_title: Watain - A Night of Black Metal Magic
overview: Celebrating the imminent coming of The Agony & Ecstasy of Watain with a private live performance at an undisclosed location in France. The concert is a collaboration between our long time allies at Hellfest, as well as the French/German TV channel Arte. While the concert itself will be invite only, it will be streamed live in its entirety via Arte on April 26th from 7:30pm CET for all to see, for all to hear
title: Watain - A Night of Black Metal Magic
